word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，含义广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试以估价其性质或效能等。
多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释或说明某一理论、定理或某一观点等。
指为观察、研究某事物以区别其真伪、优劣或效果等而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
普通用词，多用于口语或非正式场合，指试一试。

bilingual.target: 公司正在进行新软件的试验。

bilingual.source: The scientist conducted a trial to test the new drug.
bilingual.target: 科学家进行了一个试验来测试新药。

bilingual.source: The trial showed promising results for the vaccine.
bilingual.target: 这个试验显示了疫苗的有希望的结果。

bilingual.source: The experimenter adjusted the equipment before starting the trial.
bilingual.target: 实验者在开始试验前调整了设备。

bilingual.source: The mab showed promising results in the clinical trial.
bilingual.target: 单克隆抗体在临床试验中显示出有希望的结果。

bilingual.source: The randomized trial showed significant improvements in patient outcomes.
bilingual.target: 随机化的试验显示患者结果有显著改善。

bilingual.source: She is participating in a clinical trial for glioblastoma treatment.
bilingual.target: 她正在参加一个胶质母细胞瘤治疗的临床试验。

list.abstract: trial（英[ˈtraɪəl]，美[ˈtraɪəl]），是英文单词，作名词为讯问；审讯；审理等，作动词为试验；测试；参加比赛。短语搭配有trial and error（反复试验, 试错法）。例句为“She won her first jury trial.（她赢得了第一次陪审团审判。）” 该单词的复数形式为trials。

yingyinNormal.en: Two others? Well, it was trial and error. We had to find the right waistband.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另两个？我们反复试验来着，得找到合适的裤腰尺寸。

yingyinNormal.en: That's an odd mix of people. Well, for our first time hosting, I thought it would be wise to conduct a trial run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 客人的组合好奇怪啊。我们第一次邀请客人来家里，我认为先做个试验是明智之举。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll see you at court, okay? At the trial.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法庭上见了，好吗? 开庭的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it will, at your trial. This is real, Howard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，没错，霍华德，你要被审讯这是真的。

yingyinNormal.en: Answer honestly. This is not a trial. That'll come later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实话就行了，这又不是在审问你，之后才会审问。

yingyinNormal.en: After the trial. Peter, it's a formality. The apartment's mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 庭审后。彼得，这只是手续，这间公寓是我的。

yingyinNormal.en: You paid that? Free trial. I took the test to see if I qualify for the free trial.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你付款了吗？免费试听，我做了测试，看看我符不符合免费试听资格。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, Jeffrey Grant, the guy on trial. He was in here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，杰弗里·格兰特，那个正在受审的家伙，他那晚在这儿。

yingyinNormal.en: It's all because of my dad's whole trial thing, you know?
yingyinNormal.zh: 都是因为我爸被审问的事，你知道吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Before the trial, I never thought about the past. I never had to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在审判之前，我从没想过以前的事。我从来没那个必要。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, until he resigned two days ago. Yes, but he was privy to our trial strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，直到两天前他辞职了。是，但他了解我们的检控策略。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd live in terror, dreading every race, every practice, every trial. I cannot do it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会活得心惊胆战，每次他比赛练习，试驾，都忧心忡忡，我做不到！

yingyinNormal.en: Well, they're not talking about trial strategy, they're talking about moving Diane out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们讨论的不是庭审策略，而是怎么排挤戴安。

yingyinNormal.en: So I won't ask about trial strategy. This is about the prosecution perjuring themselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我不会问检控策略的，这是关于控方作假证。

yingyinNormal.en: Cause one of the victims happened to write a book. That's why they're on trial and nobody else!
yingyinNormal.zh: 碰巧有个受害者写了本书，所以只有她们接受审判，其他人都没事！

yingyinNormal.en: It isn't just growing food as a trial of ingenuity, in some parts of China, it's just living there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不仅仅是食物的生产，在中国某些地方，仅是在此生存就是对聪敏才智的试炼。

yingyinNormal.en: His current murder trial. I told him that the parents of his client came to me for a second opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他手上的谋杀案，我告诉他，他客户的父母来找我，让我提供不同意见。

yingyinNormal.en: You choose six women, you put them on trial, you say, "They were the evil ones, they were the guilty ones."
yingyinNormal.zh: 选出六个女人，对她们进行审判，然后说“她们是邪恶者，她们才是罪人”。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is your prisoner, Kirk? Per Starfleet regulation, I'm planning on returning Khan to Earth to stand trial.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的犯人在哪里，柯克？根据星际舰队规定，我计划遣送可汗回到地球受审。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me! I'm asking! What is there to understand? I started out believing in this trial. I thought it was great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我！我在问你话！哪一点值得理解？我一开始还相信着。这将是场伟大的审判。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 试；尝试；审讯；审判；用刨子刨平；加热以提取；熬；争取；调查

sense_info_list.en: a formal examination of evidence in court by a judge and often a jury , to decide if someone accused of a crime is guilty or not

examination_example.sentence: The judge in Mr. McDonnell's <highlight>trial</highlight> failed to tell a jury that it must look only at his "official acts".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法官在麦克唐纳一案上并没有告诉陪审团他们只需审查麦克唐纳的“公务行为”。

examination_example.sentence: In many respects, the dearth of moral purpose frames the terms on which the <highlight>trial</highlight> took place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从许多方面来说，道德使命感的缺失体现在审判所依据的法律条款上。

examination_example.sentence: As the hacking <highlight>trial</highlight> concludes, the wider issue of dearth of integrity still stands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管窃听审判已作出结论，但是更广泛的诚信缺失问题仍然存在。

sense_info_list.en:
a test of the performance, qualities, or suitability of someone or something;
test something to assess its suitability or performance, especially a new product

examination_example.sentence: Across 18 <highlight>trials</highlight> each, the living rats were 52% more likely on average to set the social robot free than the asocial one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在每18个试验中，活着的老鼠平均释放社交机器人的可能性比释放非社交机器人高出52%。

examination_example.sentence: For one <highlight>trial</highlight>, each participant was shown a pile of pens that the researcher claimed were from a previous experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一次试验中，研究人员向每位参与者展示了一堆钢笔，研究人员声称这些钢笔来自之前的一次实验。

examination_example.sentence: Parkrun is not a race but a time <highlight>trial</highlight>: Your only competitor is the clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Parkrun（公园跑活动）不是赛跑，而是计时赛：你唯一的竞争对手是时钟。

sense_info_list.en: an experience or a person that causes difficulties for someone

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 讯问；审讯；审理；考验；试验；测试；磨练；选拔赛；预赛

word_family.mean: v. 试；尝试；审讯；审判；用刨子刨平；加热以提取；熬；争取；调查

sense_info_list.en:
a test of the performance, qualities, or suitability of someone or something;
test something to assess its suitability or performance, especially a new product

examination_example.sentence: Those involved in the clinical <highlight>trials</highlight> on average ate 3.3 servings of pasta a week instead of other carbohydrates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与临床试验的人平均每周吃3.3份意大利面，而不是其他碳水化合物。

examination_example.sentence: During a month-long hospital <highlight>trial</highlight>, researchers asked 70 patients how they felt being around the robot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在为期一个月的医院试验中，研究人员询问了70名患者对机器人的感受。

sense_info_list.en: a formal examination of evidence in court by a judge and often a jury , to decide if someone accused of a crime is guilty or not

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 讯问；审讯；审理；考验；试验；测试；磨练；选拔赛；预赛

word_family.mean: v. 试；尝试；审讯；审判；用刨子刨平；加热以提取；熬；争取；调查

sense_info_list.en:
a test of the performance; qualities; or suitability of someone or something; 
test something to assess its suitability or performance; especially a new product

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>trial</highlight> assessed the effectiveness of an early mathematics intervention (干预) aimed at preschoolers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试验评估了针对学龄前儿童的早期数学干预的有效性。

examination_example.sentence: A team of researchers from the University of York conducted a randomized (随机的) control <highlight>trial</highlight> with 691 depressed patients from 83 physician practices across England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约克大学一组研究人员对英格兰83家医师诊所的691名抑郁症患者进行了一项随机对照试验。

examination_example.sentence: We learn, in a sense, by <highlight>trial</highlight> and error.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从某种意义上说，我们是通过不断尝试来学习的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 讯问；审讯；审理；考验；试验；测试；磨练；选拔赛；预赛

word_family.mean: v. 试；尝试；审讯；审判；用刨子刨平；加热以提取；熬；争取；调查

sense_info_list.en: a test of the performance, qualities, or suitability of someone or something; test something to assess its suitability or performance, especially a new product

examination_example.sentence: One of the results produced by the <highlight>trial</highlight> project is less use of certain medicines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该试验项目产生的结果之一是减少了某些药物的使用。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>trial</highlight> project suggested that the use of medical hypnosis (催眠) can reduce pain and anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项试验项目表明，使用医疗催眠可以减轻疼痛和焦虑。

examination_example.sentence: This new six-month <highlight>trial</highlight> will help us find out if we can influence customers to stand on both sides in the long term.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个为期6个月的新试验将帮助我们发现，我们是否能够影响客户长期站在双方立场上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
